Vecna rewards your service with forbidden knowledge and a taste of what undeath has to offer.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Uncommon

Property:

Gain a +2 item bonus to knowledge checks.

Level 19: +4 item bonus.

Level 29: +6 item bonus.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Minor Action)

Effect: Choose one ally within 5 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, that ally gains vulnerable 5 necrotic, you gain resist 10 necrotic, and you deal 1d6 extra necrotic damage on attacks that deal necrotic damage.

Level 19: Resist 15 necrotic and 2d6 extra necrotic damage, and vulnerable 10 necrotic for your ally.

Level 29: Resist 20 necrotic and 3d6 extra necrotic damage, and vulnerable 15 necrotic for your ally.
